title: Which Champion represents your best friend.
body:
Since my family post got quite the response, I shall search for more answers about people :D

My best friend...

probably be represented by

http://t08.deviantart.net/AQjIzQhBJpyN4tGtGsHn54PMQPA=/fit-in/700x350/filters:fixed_height(100,100):origin()/pre12/fb62/th/pre/i/2016/177/3/b/_league_of_legends__taric__render__by_popokupingupop90-da7p2zx.png

Never have I before met a person as kind and warmhearted as him. He never wavers under any circumstances, and always has some soft humor to cheer up my day. Reserved and lovable to say the least. What about your best friends? 

http://img.pandawhale.com/129772-bring-it-on-gif-Zhxw.gif

Seriously...if you want to..._bring it on._

replies.body: {{champion:105}} This is my best friend... I don't have one
Evelynn. God only knows where she is.
Sounds kinky to me

Hate me but Yasuo represents me, in a way where if I fuck up something irl I get flamed real hard, and If I do something well everyone wants to hang out and stuff like that so yeah. And I like swords xD.

drug habbits and assholes to eachother

all my friends are teemo...

My best friend was a Malzahar main, but I believe the champion that best fits his personality is {{champion:27}}: he's smart, he's capable of a lot of evil if he really wanted, but he acts like such a troll.
Sounds like my chem teacher for some reason...i wonder why

{{champion:266}} 

I don't have one.
I have a female friend who would be the spitting image of {{champion:254}} if she dyed her hair pink.

Can I have her #
Kappa
Well, she's a lesbian so... .__.

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/aa/Omen.png/revision/latest?cb=20120219192505

Nonexistent
{{champion:154}} Kind of never stops talking about how much he goes to the gym, but still a nice guy.
could be worse...

{{champion:254}} 

She's bold and strong.  She gets in your face, and there's not a lot you can do about it. xD
I know quite a few like that...Felt them too.
{{champion:22}}
